title: Ep. 571 - Everything You’ve Heard About The Breonna Taylor Case Is A Lie
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, violent insurrectionists descend on Louisville in response to the grand jury decision in the Breonna Taylor case. But almost everything BLM has said about the shooting of Breonna Taylor is a lie. Not that the truth matters to them, but we’ll talk about the truth of the case today. Also Five Headlines including the Left fretting that Donald Trump won’t submit to a “peaceful transfer of power.” That’s an interesting charge for them to make, as they continue to burn down our cities. And in our Daily Cancellation I will cancel the CDC for trying to cancel Halloween.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
